-e ---

Comparatives via suffix 𓂋 -r hard —> harder 如 rú
Comparatives via suffix -𔖱 -𔖲 -r better
Comparatives via suffix 𓂋 -𐍉𐌶𐌰 osaʳ 𐌷𐌰𐍂𐌳𐌹𐌶𐌰 hard.osa größer < gr.osa reananlysis
Comparatives via prefix 𓂋 口 zui as so sehr…
Superlative via prefix 𓂋 口 zui 嘴 最 至 so sehr… super𓂋 vs too 太至台𓍔𓏏 tell?
Superlative via prefix 𓂋 mouth⋍MOST 末 mo4 MUCH mu 木 MOST MÒ 末 MAST Menge
